text: @realDonaldTrump Don’t bother with a press conference.  You have not accepted the responsibilities of your Presidential Office.   Go back to watching the News cycle instead of creating more chaos — Or better yet!  - Do your job and get Covid-19 testing for the country !  - Yesterday!
